name: @hauptsache.net/clickup-mcp
description: Search, create, and retrieve tasks and documents, add comments, and track time through natural language commands.

tools.name: getTaskById
tools.description: Get a ClickUp task with images and comments by ID. Always use this URL when referencing tasks in conversations or sharing with others.

tools.name: addComment
tools.description: Add a comment to a specific task with linking best practices and progress updates.

tools.name: updateTask
tools.description: Update various aspects of an existing task including name, description (append-only), status, priority, dates, tags, assignees, and parent relationships.

tools.name: createTask
tools.description: Create a new task in a specific list with full markdown support, assignment to users, and automatic linking to related tasks.

tools.name: searchTasks
tools.description: Search tasks by name, content, assignees, and ID with fuzzy matching and support for multiple search terms (OR logic). Can filter by list_ids, space_ids, todo status, or tasks assigned to current user.

tools.name: searchSpaces
tools.description: Search spaces (projects) by name or ID with fuzzy matching. Automatically fetches complete tree structure with lists, folders, and documents for 5 or fewer matches.

tools.name: getListInfo
tools.description: Get comprehensive information about a list including description, available statuses, space tags, and project context for task creation.

tools.name: updateListInfo
tools.description: Append documentation or context to a list's description (append-only for safety) with markdown support and timestamp tracking.

tools.name: getTimeEntries
tools.description: Get time entries for a specific task or all user's time entries with hierarchical display (List -> Task -> User -> Entries). Supports date filtering and team member inclusion.

tools.name: createTimeEntry
tools.description: Create a time entry (book time) on a task for the current user using decimal hours format with optional description and start time.

tools.name: readDocument
tools.description: Get a ClickUp document with page structure and content. Supports reading specific pages and provides complete document metadata with navigation.

tools.name: updateDocumentPage
tools.description: Update an existing document page's content and/or name. Requires both doc_id and page_id from readDocument. Supports append mode to add content without overwriting.

tools.name: createDocumentOrPage
tools.description: Create a new document with its first page (using space_id or list_id), add a page to an existing document (using doc_id), or create a sub-page (using doc_id and parent_page_id). Supports markdown content.

clickup_api_key.title: ClickUp API Key
clickup_api_key.description: Your ClickUp API key. Get it from Profile → Settings → Apps → API Token

clickup_team_id.title: ClickUp Team ID
clickup_team_id.description: Your ClickUp Team ID (the 7–10 digit number in the URL when in settings)

clickup_primary_language.title: Primary Language
clickup_primary_language.description: Primary language hint for search optimization (e.g., 'de' for German, 'en' for English)
